IIR digital and analog filter design given order and critical points.
Generate a 17th-order Chebyshev II analog bandpass filter from 50 Hz to 200 Hz and plot the frequency response:

entries: Chebyshev Type II bandpass frequency response

data.value: Create a digital filter with the same properties, in a system with sampling rate of 2000 Hz, and plot the frequency response. (Second-order sections implementation is required to ensure stability of a filter of this order):

entries: Chebyshev Type II bandpass frequency response
